name: Broken Boulevard
description:
Final 2D side scroller for DIG2783. 

Years after the Sun's light has gone out and the Earth's citizens have traveled to the moon, Nate Ledgers wakes up to an Earth inhabited only by vile skeleton creatures and trash. Nate and fellow survivor Tyler Higgens must team up to defeat Ignatius the Destroyer and reach the rocket ship to the moon before it's too late.

Arrow keys to move and space to interact. Only runs on Window's operating systems. If your computer flags the executable as dangerous simply selected "Keep" and "Run anyway" to open the game. This is a common issue with the game engine I use but it's 100% safe to run.
